text:
Inland Fisheries (Protected Fish) Order 2019

I make the following order under section 131(1) of the Inland Fisheries Act 1995 .

30 August 2019

GUY BARNETT

Minister for Primary Industries and Water

1. Short title
    This order may be cited as the Inland Fisheries (Protected Fish) Order 2019 .

2. Commencement
    This order takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Interpretation
    In this order â€“
        Act means Inland Fisheries Act 1995 ;
        estuary perch means fish of the species (Macquaria colonorum).

4. Protected fish
    Estuary perch is declared to be protected fish for the purposes of the Act.

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 2 October 2019

This order is administered in the Department of Primary Industries, Parks, Water and Environment.
